query:
WITH latest_metrics AS (
                            SELECT 
                                COALESCE(cumulative_event_count, 0) as prev_events,
                                COALESCE(cumulative_transfer_amount, 0) as prev_transfers,
                                COALESCE(unique_account_count, 0) as prev_unique
                            FROM metrics_plt ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
                        )
                        INSERT INTO metrics_plt (event_timestamp, cumulative_event_count, cumulative_transfer_amount, unique_account_count)
                        SELECT $1, prev_events, prev_transfers + $2, prev_unique + $3
                        FROM latest_metrics
                        ON CONFLICT (event_timestamp) DO UPDATE SET
                            cumulative_transfer_amount = GREATEST(metrics_plt.cumulative_transfer_amount, EXCLUDED.cumulative_transfer_amount),
                            unique_account_count = GREATEST(metrics_plt.unique_account_count, EXCLUDED.unique_account_count)
